Portus

{{'ABOUT.ABOUTTEXT' | translate}}

{{'ABOUT.ABOUTSUBTEXT' | translate}}

Features



Multi-language

Support for multiple languages makes the tour accessible to both English and Italian visitors.



Responsive Web App

Responsive design enables the tour to be viewed on a wide variety of devices, from desktop to mobile.



Location Aware

On mobile the tour app has location aware capablities, allowing visitors to see exactly where they are on site in Portus.

Sponsers

Developer

Peter Wheeler

Peter has designed and developed the Portus tour app, taking inspiration from his master's degree work at Southampton. You can find more about him on Twitter or on his Github account.

ArtasMedia

Grant Cox at ArtasMedia was commissioned to create the amazing plans and maps used in the tour. They are inspired from the 3D work he has been building in recent years.
